brand.name: CareMatch360
brand.tagline: Care that fits. Life that continues.
brand.description: Connecting elderly patients with the right care providers through intelligent matching.

hero.title: Finding the right care
hero.subtitle: CareMatch360 connects elderly patients with verified residential and ambulatory care providers using an intelligent matching algorithm — personalized, transparent, and compassionate.
hero.ctaPatient: Find Care for a Loved One

features.title: Everything you need
features.subtitle: in one place
features.description: From initial assessment to signed care agreement, CareMatch360 handles every step of the care-finding journey.

matching.title: Intelligent Matching
matching.desc: Our algorithm considers care level, location, specializations, and lifestyle preferences to find the best-fit providers.

transparency.title: Full Transparency
transparency.desc: View staff stability, continuity ratios, and family communication scores — not just glossy brochures.

offers.title: Direct Offers
offers.desc: Providers send personalized care offers directly to patients. Accept, decline, or compare — at your own pace.

secure.title: Privacy First
secure.desc: GDPR-compliant, EU-hosted data. Your medical information is encrypted and only shared with your consent.

multilingual.title: Multi-language Support
multilingual.desc: Available in German, English, and Arabic — because good care transcends language barriers.

billing.title: Simple Billing
billing.desc: Transparent subscription plans for providers. Patients always use the platform for free.

1.title: Create Your Profile
1.desc: Tell us about the care needs, location, lifestyle preferences, and medical requirements.

2.title: Get Matched
2.desc: Our engine instantly calculates compatibility scores across all verified providers in your region.

3.title: Receive Offers
3.desc: Providers send personalized care proposals directly to you. Compare side by side.

4.title: Start Care
4.desc: Accept an offer and begin your care journey with full digital record keeping.

plans.title: Simple, transparent pricing
plans.subtitle: For care providers. Patients always join free.

cta.subtitle: Join thousands of families who found peace of mind with CareMatch360.
